members.member:
Registers a new user
Username: string max value 20 min value 2
Email: string max value 50 min value 5
Name: string max value 50 min value 2
Surname: string max value 50 min value 2
Date: Date, format: yyyy - mm - dd, min value today - 100 years, max value today
Gender: Male or Female
ImageLink: Optional
> Ok
